name: The Man & The Wall: First Act
description:
The project “The Man & The Wall” is composed of 4 pieces. It was made entirely from a single photo of my shadow.  Mixed digital and analog processes were used, with an experimental approach - such as printing, cropping and torning, distorting in scanner, and digital manipulation. This is an intuitive expression of themes such as self-perception, dualities, projections and psychological pain. 

This work was done a few years ago and is very personal, so I was a little reluctant to share.But at the same time it's one of the works I'm most proud of, so I decided to post it.
